mcpaint.message.resource_pack_reload.inf: If studios or paintings have shifted or off-centered canvases, you can use /trigger mcpaint.reload to reload nearby text displays.
mcpaint.message.resource_pack_dismiss.in: Do not show this message again
mcpaint.message.resource_pack_dismissed: Dismissed message. You can re-enable the message in the %s.
block.mcpaint.computer.popup.delete: Delete "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
block.mcpaint.computer.popup.overwrite_f: File "%s" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
item.mcpaint.computer.lore: Goes beep boop and does math
item.mcpaint.illegal_item: Uh oh, you're not supposed to have this.
mcpaint.advancements.root.title: MC Paint!
mcpaint.advancements.apply_egg.title: True Tempera Paint
mcpaint.advancements.apply_egg.descripti: Apply a healthy dose of Egg to a Minecraft Painting
mcpaint.advancements.use_dye.title: Conventional Colours
mcpaint.advancements.use_dye.description: Use a Dye item to set the colour in the colour picker
mcpaint.advancements.place_custom_painti: Export and place your first custom painting
mcpaint.advancements.load_work.title: We Need to Go Back
mcpaint.advancements.load_work.descripti: Load up one of your previous works in the Studio
mcpaint.advancements.craft_computer.desc: Cover up an Observer's face with one of your custom paintings
mcpaint.advancements.delete_work.title: Lost to the Ages
mcpaint.advancements.delete_work.descrip: Delete one of your works from the Computer's file manager
mcpaint.advancements.encode_base64.title: Sharing is Caring
mcpaint.advancements.encode_base64.descr: Encode one of your works as a code that you can share with your friends
mcpaint.advancements.decode_base64.title: I Made This
mcpaint.advancements.decode_base64.descr: Use the Computer's importer to convert a code into a painting file
Use a Spyglass on a custom painting to make it visible from far away. Clicking again will revert the view range
mcpaint.advancements.set_glowing.title: A Touch of Radium Green
mcpaint.advancements.set_glowing.descrip: Use a Glow Ink Sac on a custom painting to make it glow in the dark. Using an Ink Sac will remove the glow
mcpaint.advancements.set_no_background.d: Use Shears on a custom painting to remove the background. Using White Wool will restore the background
mcpaint.cutscene.egg.2: <Kristoffer Zetterstrand> So you think you can do better?
mcpaint.cutscene.egg.3: <Kristoffer Zetterstrand> Show me what you got!
mcpaint.message.author_has_no_works: You do not have any saved works yet.
mcpaint.message.must_hold_writable_book: You need to hold a Book and Quill to use this function.
mcpaint.message.must_hold_painting: You need to hold a Painting to use this function.
mcpaint.message.must_save_first: You need to save your work first.
mcpaint.message.break_studio_unsaved_cha: This studio has unsaved changes! Are you sure?
mcpaint.message.filesize_warning: Warning: your painting currenly has %s bytes worth of text. Large paintings cause more lag, and may even fail to load.
mcpaint.popup.load.nothing_selected: You have not selected a file.
mcpaint.setting.server.title: [Server Settings]
mcpaint.setting.server.use_click_detecti: Uses Advancements to detect left- and right-clicks on Interaction Entities. This creates less lag than checking for entities each tick, but does not work on Realms.
mcpaint.setting.server.send_egg_chat.inf: Sends a little story in chat when creating a new Studio by throwing an Egg at a Painting
mcpaint.setting.client.title: [Client Settings]
mcpaint.setting.client.send_rp_message.i: Sends a message 10 seconds after joining the game informing you of the status of the installed Resource Pack and an explanation of the /trigger mcpaint.reload command
